options.content: **Automated Documents** = Documents where status changed from `ready_for_validation` in less than 60 seconds (no manual intervention required)

targets.rawSql:
WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id,
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
)
SELECT
    ROUND(
        (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        )::NUMERIC * 100)
        /
        NULLIF(
            COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            ), 
            0
        ),
        1
    ) AS "Automation Rate"
FROM status_changes sc
JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
    ON sc.org_id = oc.id
WHERE 
    oc.name IN ($org_sandbox);

WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id,
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
)
SELECT
    ROUND(
        (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        )::NUMERIC * 100)
        /
        NULLIF(
            COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            ), 
            0
        ),
        1
    ) AS "Automation Rate"
FROM status_changes sc
JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
    ON sc.org_id::uuid = oc.id::uuid
WHERE 
    oc.name IN ($org_prod);

WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id, 
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on,
        LEAD(current_status) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_status
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
),
automated_counts AS (
    SELECT
        oc.name AS org_name, 
        d.doc_type, 
        COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        ) AS automated_documents_count
    FROM status_changes sc
    JOIN public.documents d 
        ON sc.doc_id = d.id 
    JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
        -- KORREKTUR: Beides explizit in UUID konvertieren
        ON sc.org_id::uuid = oc.id::uuid
    
    -- HIER KOMMT DIE FILTERUNG DURCH DIE GRAFANA-VARIABLE HIN
    WHERE
        oc.name IN ($org_sandbox) 
    
    GROUP BY oc.name, d.doc_type
    
    HAVING COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        ) > 0
)
SELECT
    org_name AS "Organization",
    doc_type AS "Document Type",
    automated_documents_count AS "Automated Documents Count",
    ROUND(
        (automated_documents_count::NUMERIC * 100) / 
        SUM(automated_documents_count) OVER (), 
        2
    )::TEXT || '%' AS "Automation Share Percent"

FROM automated_counts
ORDER BY 
    "Organization",
    "Automated Documents Count" DESC;

WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id,
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on,
        LEAD(current_status) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_status
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        -- HIER ist der Grafana Zeitfilter eingebaut
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
)
SELECT
    oc.name AS "Organization",
    

    
    -- NEW NAME: automated_count
    COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
        WHERE 
            sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
            AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
    ) AS "Automated Documents",
    
    -- NEW NAME: total_qualified_documents
    COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
        WHERE 
            sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
    ) AS "Total Documents",
    
    -- NEW NAME: automation_rate_percent
    (
        ROUND(
            (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                    AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                    AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
            )::NUMERIC * 100)
            /
            NULLIF(
                COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                    WHERE 
                        sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                ), 
                0
            ),
            2
        )
    )::TEXT || '%' AS "Automation Rate Percent"
    
FROM status_changes sc
JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
    ON sc.org_id = oc.id
-- NEUE WHERE-KLAUSEL HINZUFÜGEN:
WHERE 
    oc.name IN ($org_sandbox)
GROUP BY oc.name
-- Sortierung nach der numerischen Prozent-Berechnung (absteigend)
ORDER BY 
    ROUND(
        (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        )::NUMERIC * 100)
        /
        NULLIF(
            COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            ), 
            0
        ),
        2
    ) DESC;

WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id,
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on,
        LEAD(current_status) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_status
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        -- HIER ist der Grafana Zeitfilter eingebaut
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
)
SELECT
    oc.name AS "Organization",
    

    
    -- Umbenannt zu automated_count
    COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
        WHERE 
            sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
            AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
    ) AS "Automated Documents",
    
    -- Umbenannt zu total_qualified_documents
    COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
        WHERE 
            sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
    ) AS "Total Documents",
    
    -- Umbenannt zu automation_rate_percent
    (
        ROUND(
            (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                    AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                    AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
            )::NUMERIC * 100)
            /
            NULLIF(
                COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                    WHERE 
                        sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                ), 
                0
            ),
            2
        )
    )::TEXT || '%' AS "Automation Rate Percent"
    
-- ... (innerhalb der SELECT-Abfrage)
FROM status_changes sc
JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
    -- NEU: Konvertierung von oc.id (falls VARCHAR) in UUID für den Vergleich
    ON sc.org_id::uuid = oc.id::uuid

-- HIER KOMMT DER FILTER HIN
WHERE oc.name IN ($org_prod) 

GROUP BY oc.name
-- WICHTIG: NEU sortiert nach der gesamten Prozent-Berechnung (numerisch)
ORDER BY
-- ... (restliche ORDER BY Logik)
    ROUND(
        (COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        )::NUMERIC * 100)
        /
        NULLIF(
            COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
                WHERE 
                    sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
            ), 
            0
        ),
        2
    ) DESC;

WITH status_changes AS (
    SELECT
        org_id, -- Hinzugefügt: Wir benötigen die Organisations-ID
        doc_id,
        current_status,
        created_on,
        LEAD(created_on) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_created_on,
        LEAD(current_status) OVER (PARTITION BY doc_id ORDER BY created_on) AS next_status
    FROM public.document_log
    WHERE 
        is_deleted = FALSE
        AND $__timeFilter(created_on)
),
automated_counts AS (
    SELECT
        oc.name AS org_name, 
        d.doc_type, 
        COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        ) AS automated_documents_count
    FROM status_changes sc
    JOIN public.documents d 
        ON sc.doc_id = d.id 
    -- NEU: Join zur Organisationstabelle
    JOIN public.organisation_cache oc
        -- Konvertierung beider Seiten zu UUID, um Typfehler zu vermeiden
        ON sc.org_id::uuid = oc.id::uuid
    
    -- ##################################################################
    -- NEUE FILTERUNG: Fügt den Grafana Dropdown-Filter '$org_prod' ein
    WHERE 
        oc.name IN ($org_prod) 
    -- ##################################################################

    -- GRUPPIERUNG NACH BEIDEN FELDERN
    GROUP BY oc.name, d.doc_type
    
    HAVING COUNT(sc.doc_id) FILTER (
            WHERE 
                sc.current_status = 'ready_for_validation'
                AND sc.next_created_on IS NOT NULL
                AND EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (sc.next_created_on - sc.created_on)) < 60
        ) > 0
)
SELECT
    org_name AS "Organization", 
    doc_type AS "Document Type",
    automated_documents_count AS "Automated Documents Count",
    -- BERECHNUNG: Anteil des Typs an der Gesamtsumme
    ROUND(
        (automated_documents_count::NUMERIC * 100) / 
        SUM(automated_documents_count) OVER (), 
        2
    )::TEXT || '%' AS "Automation Share Percent"

FROM automated_counts
ORDER BY 
    "Organization", 
    "Automated Documents Count" DESC;

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT oc.name
FROM public.organisation_cache oc
JOIN public.document_log dl ON oc.id = dl.org_id
WHERE dl.is_deleted = FALSE
  AND $__timeFilter(dl.created_on)
ORDER BY oc.name;
list.label: org_sandbox
list.name: org_sandbox
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT oc.name
FROM public.organisation_cache oc
JOIN public.document_log dl ON oc.id = dl.org_id
WHERE dl.is_deleted = FALSE
  AND $__timeFilter(dl.created_on)
ORDER BY oc.name;

SELECT DISTINCT oc.name
FROM public.organisation_cache oc
JOIN public.document_log dl ON oc.id = dl.org_id
WHERE dl.is_deleted = FALSE
  AND $__timeFilter(dl.created_on)
ORDER BY oc.name;
list.name: org_prod
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT oc.name
FROM public.organisation_cache oc
JOIN public.document_log dl ON oc.id = dl.org_id
WHERE dl.is_deleted = FALSE
  AND $__timeFilter(dl.created_on)
ORDER BY oc.name;
